product_name: The North Face  Impulse Active Quarter-Zip Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A light, technical top for cool-weather runs, The North Face Impulse Active Quarter-Zip Shirt uses breathable panels with FlashDryTM fibers that dry fast and regulate body temperature.
short_description: A light, technical top for cool-weather runs, The North Face Impulse Active Quarter-Zip Shirt uses breathable panels with FlashDryTM fibers that dry fast and regulate body temperature.
